product_name: CamelBak Antidote Lumbar Reservoir - 70 fl. oz.
long_description: Take the load off your shoulders and carry your water more efficiently on long runs or rides! The CamelBak Antidote(TM) 70 oz. Lumbar Reservoir provides reliable hydration while you're on the go. Anatomic shape of the reservoir places the weight across your lumbar region for efficient load-carrying. Low-profile fit with baffling helps keep water in place for increased stability and comfort on your run or ride. Bite valve is easy to use-just bite and sip; HydroLock(TM) valve shuts off water, preventing leaking during transport. Wide-mouth, easy-open cap makes cleaning and filling the reservoir a snap. Quick Link(TM) connection system allows easy disconnection of tube and allows integration of other CamelBak accessories (sold separately) into the Antidote Lumbar reservoir.
short_description: Take the load off your shoulders and carry your water more efficiently on long runs or rides! The CamelBak Antidote(TM) 70 oz. Lumbar Reservoir provides reliable hydration while you're on the go.
